name: Killer Kevs Magical Christmas
description: Killer Kevs Magical Christmas was created by Wizards Kiss Studio. Which comprises of five students from Priestley College in Warrington UK. Joni Ashton, Bronwyn Crowley Green, John Dean, Adam Stallwood and Dane Bramhall are second year students taking a Btec in Game Design. This is their first attempt at a Game Jam ran over 4 day by Game Design graduates. They were given 28 hours directed time to design and build their game from scratch.
